##Extra functions we need
If you haven't installed the packages first you will need to run  install.packages("<package>") in the terminal below.
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

##Read in data
```{r}
data <- read.csv(example.csv)

```

In R there are many ways to do the same thing. 

##Summary
```{r}
summary(data)

```


##Visualize
```{r}
plot(data)

```
